title: Saints-Falcons
text: Activate your digital access. Saints-Falcons New Orleans Saints defensive end Cameron Jordan (94) and nose tackle Austin Brown (71) celebrate a defensive play against the Atlanta Falcons in the second half of their game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. Chuck Cook-USA TODAY Sports New Orleans Saints quarterback Drew Brees (9) throws against the Atlanta Falcons during the fourth quarter of a game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. Derick E. Hingle-USA TODAY Sports Fullscreen New Orleans Saints running back Mark Ingram (22) is tackled by Atlanta Falcons defensive end Tyson Jackson (94) and middle linebacker Paul Worrilow (55) during the fourth quarter of a game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. The Saints defeated the Falcons 31-21. Derick E. Hingle-USA TODAY Sports New Orleans Saints quarterback Drew Brees (9) throws as he is grabbed by Atlanta Falcons defensive tackle Ra'Shede Hageman (77) during the second half of a game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. Derick E. Hingle-USA TODAY Sports Atlanta Falcons running back Devonta Freeman (24) is tackled by New Orleans Saints defensive end Cameron Jordan (94) in the second half of their game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. Chuck Cook-USA TODAY Sports New Orleans Saints tight end Benjamin Watson (82) makes a two-yard touchdown catch in the third quarter against the Atlanta Falcons of their game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. Chuck Cook-USA TODAY Sports New Orleans Saints tight end Benjamin Watson (82) is pursued by Atlanta Falcons strong safety William Moore (25) in the third quarter of their game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. Chuck Cook-USA TODAY Sports New Orleans Saints running back Khiry Robinson (29) runs against the Atlanta Falcons in the second half of their game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. Chuck Cook-USA TODAY Sports New Orleans Saints wide receiver Willie Snead (83) is tackled by Atlanta Falcons free safety Robenson Therezie (27) in the second half of their game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. Chuck Cook-USA TODAY Sports Atlanta Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan (2) is tackled by New Orleans Saints defensive end Cameron Jordan (94) during the second quarter of a game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. Derick E. Hingle-USA TODAY Sports New Orleans Saints head coach Sean Payton against the Atlanta Falcons during the second quarter of a game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. Derick E. Hingle-USA TODAY Sports New Orleans Saints cornerback Brandon Browner (39) celebrates with defensive end Cameron Jordan (94) after recovering a fumble against the Atlanta Falcons during the second quarter of a game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. Derick E. Hingle-USA TODAY Sports New Orleans Saints tight end Benjamin Watson (82) is upended by Atlanta Falcons free safety Robenson Therezie (27) during the second quarter of a game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. Derick E. Hingle-USA TODAY Sports New Orleans Saints quarterback Drew Brees (9) is pressured by Atlanta Falcons defensive end Adrian Clayborn (99) during the second quarter of a game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. Hingle-USA TODAY Sports New Orleans Saints linebacker Michael Mauti (56) celebrates after blocking a punt and recovering it for a touchdown against the Atlanta Falcons during the first quarter of a game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. Hingle-USA TODAY Sports New Orleans Saints cornerback Brandon Browner (39) and strong safety Kenny Vaccaro (32) and defensive end Bobby Richardson (78) stop Atlanta Falcons running back Devonta Freeman (24) during the first quarter of a game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. Derick E. Hingle-USA TODAY Sports New Orleans Saints running back Mark Ingram (22) scores a touchdown on a two-yard run while defended by Atlanta Falcons outside linebacker Nate Stupar (54) in the first quarter of their game against the Atlanta Falcons at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. hChuck Cook-USA TODAY Sports New Orleans Saints wide receiver Willie Snead (83) breaks a tackle by Atlanta Falcons cornerback Robert Alford (23) during the first quarter of a game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. Hingle-USA TODAY Sports New Orleans Saints quarterback Drew Brees (9) after a first quarter touchdown run by running back Mark Ingram (22) of their game against the Atlanta Falcons at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome.
